message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value item. I'm thinking of a price of $12000 for it. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10000. I can offer you a compromise at $11500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $10800. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I can see we're getting close. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10800 and $11500. How about we try $11150?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10900. Can you meet me there?
I can see we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10950. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go much lower than $11000, Bob. I can see we're very close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $11050. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm really close to my budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10900. Can you meet me there?
